Desc.entry: Community centre offering Megakidz Playzone with Megarelax coffee house. Runs weekly youth clubs, pre-school activity clubs, parent and toddler groups. Also provides conferencing facilities, Meganursery, The Storehouse (providing emergency food hampers for people in distress), training courses for 16-19 year olds and organises Sheffield's Night of Honour. Runs City Hearts, a residential programme for women overcoming serious life issues (see separate entry).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-6pm, Sat 10am-4pm (office times); Mon-Fri 8am-6pm (nursery for children aged 1-4 years), Fri 7-9pm (NEON, youth club for young people aged 11-17 years)
